description: This file declares the interface IController, which provides methods for managing and controlling a system or application, including persisting state, deleting resources, rebooting, configuring environment and settings, and cloning instances. It is a deprecated interface within the plugin host of the WPEFramework.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: An interface for controlling certain aspects of a plugin host, including persistence, deletion, reboot, environment management, configuration, and cloning.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Persists the current state or configuration.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a resource specified by path.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves environment information based on an index.

methods.name: Configuration (getter)
methods.description: Retrieves configuration data for a given callsign.

methods.name: Configuration (setter)
methods.description: Sets configuration data for a given callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Clones a base callsign to a new callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
